title: Ennodu Nee Irundhaal Lyrics I Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ennodu Nee Irundhaal
Singer(s): Sid Sriram, Sunitha Sarathy
Movie: I
Music: AR Rahman
Lyrics: Kabilan
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Kaattrai tharum
kaadugale vendaam
po thanneer tharum
kadal venaam
naan unna urangave
boomi vendaam
thaevai yedhuvum thaevlaiyilai
theavaiyillai dhevadhaye.

ennodu nee irundhaal
uyirodu naan iruppen (repeat)

oh ennai naan yaarendu
sonnaalum puriyaadhe
en kadhal nee endru
yaarukkum theriyaadhe.

nee kettal ulagaththai
naan vaangi tharuven
nee illaa ulagaththil
naan vaazha maatteeney.

Ennodu Nee Irundhaal

Unmai kadhal yaadhendraal
unai ennai solveney
neeyum  naanum poiendraal
kadhalai thedi kolveney

koondhal meesai ondraaga
oosi noolil thaippeney
thengaai-kulle neer pola
nenjil thaekki vaippeney.

Vaththikuchi kaambil
roja pookkumaa
poonai thaenai kettal
pookkal yerkkumaa

Mudhalai kalaththil
malaralaai malardhaen.
kulandhai arugae
kurangalaai bayandhaen.

ennodu nee irundhaal
uyirodu naan iruppen (repeat)

nee illaa ulagaththil
naan vaazha maatteeney.

Ennodu Nee Irundhaal		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
to breath fresh air
don’t need a forest .
to have water
don’t need a sea .
to eat and sleep
don’t need Earth.
don’t need any need
don’t need, my angel.

if you’re with me
I will live with soul

if you even tell about me
I couldn’t understand me
you’re my only love
but no one know’s it.

if you ask me
I’ll buy this world for you
I will not live
in this world without you

if you’re with me

who are true lovers?
I will tell you and me.
if we both are a lie
I’ll kill the “love”.

I’ll stitch your hair and my Mustache
with needle and thread
will hold you in my heart
like water in Coconut.

will a Rose blossom
in match stick ?
if a kitten ask for honey
will a flower accept that ?

I blossomed like a flower
in between crocodile’s land
Near baby’s
am afraid like a Monkey

if you’re with me
I will live with soul

I will not live
in this world without you

if you’re with me
